description:
Provides a resource to manage an S3 Control Bucket Policy.

-> This functionality is for managing [S3 on Outposts](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/S3onOutposts.html). To manage S3 Bucket Policies in an AWS Partition, see the [`aws_s3_bucket_policy` resource](/docs/providers/aws/r/s3_bucket_policy.html).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Bucket.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bucket.

Policy.description: JSON string of the resource policy. For more information about building AWS IAM policy documents with Terraform, see the [AWS IAM Policy Document Guide](https://learn.hashicorp.com/terraform/aws/iam-policy).
